title: Custom ROM brings One UI 4.1 to Galaxy S9 and Note 9
content:
Another week, another developer shoehorning the newest Android builds to old devices. This time it’s the turn of One UI 4.1, which has been ported to the Galaxy S9 and Note 9.

more…

The post Custom ROM brings One UI 4.1 to Galaxy S9 and Note 9 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: For those with the Samsung Galaxy S9, S9+ or Note 9, you can get One UI 4.1 with Android 12 courtesy of a custom ROM called Noble ROM 2.1.
